name: Scientist
action: You need only 4 cards of the same color to do the Discover a Cure action.

name: Quarantine Specialist
action: Prevent disease cube placements (and outbreaks) in the city you are in and all cities connected to it.

name: Researcher
action: As an action, you may give (or a player can take) any City card from your hand. You must both be in the same city. The card does not have to match the city you are in.

name: Dispatcher
action: Move another player's pawn as if it were yours. As an action, move any pawn to a city with another pawn. Get permission before moving another player's pawn

name: Contingency Planner
action: As an action, take any discarded Event card and store it on this card. When you play the stored Event card, remove it from the game. Limit: 1 Event card on this card at a time, which is not part of your hand.

name: Medic
action: Remove all cubes of one color when doing Treat Disease. Automatically remove cubes of cured diseases from the city you are in (and prevent them from being placed there).

name: Operations Expert
action: As an action, build a research station in the city you are in (no City card needed). Once per turn as an action, move from a research station to any city by discarding any City card.
